page.title: 16HOME LIFE
page.content: I live in a semi-detached house with a kitchen (diner), a sitting room and a hall downstairs, and three bedrooms, a bathroom, a toilet and a loft (and darkroom) upstairs. I come from a family of five. I have a Mum, a Dad, a sister called Eve, and a black cat called Polly. We have one car, a black Metro City. We have three meals a day breakfast, lunch and dinner. We have one black and white portable television, a record player and two radios. In our kictchen we have a fridge-freezer, cooker and washing machine. We eat all our meals in the kitchen, but if it is very hot we eat outside on the patio, and we sometimes have a bar-be-cue. My interests are drawing, tennis, badminton, and collecting stamps, stickers, rubbers, tins and antiques. {By Siobhan Honney Age 13\ years
